description: This file defines the AppState class, which manages the central application state for a French learning app. It handles vocabulary, phrases, user preferences (favorites and learned items), and quiz functionality, including data initialization, persistence, and quiz logic.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that maintains application data such as vocabulary, phrases, user preferences, and quiz state.

classes.name: _QuizQuestion
classes.description: Represents a quiz question, including prompt, options, and correctness check.

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Initializes SharedPreferences, loads stored data, and generates quiz questions.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Persists favorites and learned items to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Adds or removes a vocabulary item from favorites.

methods.name: toggleLearned
methods.description: Adds or removes a vocabulary item from learned items.

methods.name: restartQuiz
methods.description: Resets quiz state and regenerates questions.

methods.name: answer
methods.description: Records an answer choice, updates score, and marks question as answered.

methods.name: nextQuestion
methods.description: Advances to the next quiz question if available.
